TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TypeDescriptionProvider extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供補充的中繼資料給。

span.span: Provides supplemental metadata to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會擴充以動態方式新增、 修改或隱藏特性，例如屬性、 屬性和事件與型別或物件相關聯的型別資訊。The class dynamically extends the type information associated with a type or object by adding, modifying, or hiding characteristics such as attributes, properties, and events. 可以有多個型別描述提供者的類別提供中繼資料，以單一。There can be multiple type description provider classes that offer metadata to a single . 有兩種方式可建立關聯與:There are two ways to associate a with a : - 在設計階段，當目標類別可以指派適當標記。At design time, when the target class can be assigned the appropriate tag. - 在執行階段，當一個的方法的可以呼叫類別。At run time, when one of the methods of the class can be called. 這些多載的方法需要目標物件或其類別型別。These overloaded methods require either the target object or its class type. 類別必須仰賴相同的類型，在建構期間所提供的父物件。The class relies on a parent object of the same type, supplied during construction. 這可讓衍生自類別選擇性地覆寫方法。This allows classes that derive from to selectively override methods. 執行個體只根據需求，自訂的型別資訊，對效能的影響降到最低。Instances of are only built upon demand, minimizing the impact of custom type information on performance.

para.span: 衍生的型別可能會標示為或是，但您類型的執行個體可以使用建立類別。

span.span: Your derived type might be marked as or , but an instance of your type can be created with the class.

para.span: 不要撰寫安全的程式碼假設呼叫端受信任。

span.span: Do not write insecure code by assuming the caller is trusted.

para.span: 相反地，假設呼叫端可能會建立您的型別執行個體，在部分信任中。

span.span: Assume instead that callers might create instances of your type in partial trust.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式相當於呼叫另建構函式的參數值與`null`。This constructor is equivalent to calling the other constructor with a parameter value that is `null`.

summary.span: 初始化的新執行個體類別使用父型別描述提供者。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using a parent type description provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`parent`參數是`null`，則所有方法會傳回預設值。If the `parent` parameter is `null`, all methods will return default values. 否則，所有方法會將委派的方法`parent`。Otherwise, all methods will delegate to the methods of `parent`. 下表顯示的預設傳回值方法。The following table shows the default return values for methods. |方法Method|預設的傳回值Default return value| |------------|--------------------------| ||`null`| ||新建立的物件，可透過呼叫方法。A newly created object through a call to the method.| ||預設執行個體類別。A default instance of a class.| ||預設執行個體類別。A default instance of a class.| ||`objectType`第一個參數。The `objectType` first parameter.|

span.span: An optional service provider.
The type of object to create.

param.span: 選擇性的類型，代表要傳遞給物件的建構函式的參數類型的陣列。

param.span: 這個陣列可以是或長度為零。

span.span: This array can be or of zero length.

param.name: args
param.span: 要傳遞給物件建構函式的選擇性參數值陣列。

span.span: An optional array of parameter values to pass to the object's constructor.

summary.span: 建立可以代替另一種資料類型的物件。

span.span: Creates an object that can substitute for another data type.
The substitute .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所指定`provider`傳入的參數方法類別。The specified by the `provider` parameter is passed in by the method of the class. 如果`provider`不是`null`，若要取得有關建立呼叫的其他內容的型別描述提供者可以使用服務提供者。If `provider` is not `null`, the service provider can be used by the type description provider to obtain additional context about the creation call. 方式`virtual`，預設情況下，傳回的結果方法如果`provider`是`null`。The method is `virtual` and, by default, returns the result of the method if `provider` is `null`. 如果`provider`已`null`，這個方法會叫用父提供者的方法。If `provider` is `null`, this method will invoke the method of the parent provider.

para.span: 如果在衍生的類別不感興趣提供替代執行個體，它應該只會呼叫基底實作。

span.span: If the derived class is not interested in providing a substitute instance, it should just call the base implementation.

span.span: The object for which to get the cache.

summary.span: 取得每個物件的快取，以存取索引鍵/值組。

span.span: Gets a per-object cache, accessed as an of key/value pairs.

returns.span: 如果所提供的物件支援快取; 否則。

span.span: An if the provided object supports caching; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可能需要執行的中繼資料的集合上的複雜作業。A may need to perform complex operations on collections of metadata. 因為類型不是加入網域的存留期間卸載類別會自動快取這些類型為基礎的作業的結果。Because types are not unloaded for the life of a domain, the class will automatically cache the results of these operations based on type. 不過，某些作業會使用即時物件執行個體。However, some operations use live object instances. 這些作業無法快取內類別，因為快取它們會防止物件被記憶體回收。These operations cannot be cached within the class because caching them would prevent the object from being garbage collected. 相反地，類別可讓每個物件的快取，以存取索引鍵/值組，在物件上存在。Instead, the class allows for a per-object cache, accessed as an of key/value pairs, to exist on an object. 方法會傳回此快取的執行個體。The method returns an instance of this cache. 方法會傳回`null`如果物件不支援快取。The method will return `null` if there is no supported cache for an object. 預設值供會檢查物件是否實作站台的元件介面。The default used by examines the object to see if it is a sited component that implements the interface. 如果物件是，它會使用字典服務來儲存物件的快取。If the object is, it uses the dictionary service to store the object's cache. 它會傳回物件，否則為`null`。Otherwise, the object it returns `null`. 其他型別描述提供者可能會提供自己的實作。Other type description providers may provide their own implementation here. 比方說，相依性物件可以只將屬性附加型別的。For example, dependency objects can just attach a property of type .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor GetExtendedTypeDescriptor (object instance);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor GetExtendedTypeDescriptor(object instance) cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetExtendedTypeDescriptor (instance As Object) As ICustomTypeDescriptor
public: virtual System::ComponentModel::ICustomTypeDescriptor ^ GetExtendedTypeDescriptor(System::Object ^ instance);
abstract member GetExtendedTypeDescriptor : obj -> System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor override this.GetExtendedTypeDescriptor : obj -> System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor

param.name: instance
param.span: 要為其取得擴充型別描述元物件。

span.span: The object for which to get the extended type descriptor.

summary.span: 取得指定物件的擴充自訂型別描述元。

span.span: Gets an extended custom type descriptor for the given object.

returns.span: ，可以提供擴充的中繼資料物件。

span.span: An that can provide extended metadata for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 擴充型別描述元是供應項目屬性的其他物件加入至這個物件，但不是實際物件定義的自訂類型描述元。An extended type descriptor is a custom type descriptor that offers properties that other objects have added to this object, but that are not actually defined on the object. 例如，在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]元件模型物件，實作介面可以將屬性附加至位於相同的邏輯容器中的其他物件。For example, in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] component model, objects that implement the interface can attach properties to other objects that reside in the same logical container. 多載方法不會傳回型別描述項，提供這些額外的擴充屬性。The overloaded methods do not return a type descriptor that provides these extra extended properties. 方法會傳回這些延伸屬性的集合。The method returns the set of these extended properties. 會自動合併這些兩個屬性集合的結果。The will automatically merge the results of these two property collections. 雖然[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]元件模型支援擴充屬性，僅可用於擴充的屬性，以及事件，如果型別描述提供者支援它。While the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] component model supports only extended properties, can be used for extended attributes as well as events, if the type description provider supports it. 是`virtual`和預設的情況下，會傳回自訂類型描述元，會傳回空的結果，如果沒有父提供者傳遞。 is `virtual` and, by default, returns a custom type descriptor that returns empty results if no parent provider was passed. 如果傳遞父提供者，這個方法會叫用父提供者的方法。If a parent provider was passed, this method will invoke the parent provider's method.
